item.title: Increasing intent improves results
item.description: How defining and continuously aligning with goals helps achieve them.

item.title: Starting with a new team
item.description: Tips for starting with a new team

item.title: Be nice, especially when you don't want to be
item.description: When you really to blow up at someone, this is the exact moment where you should be really nice to them.

item.title: The bus factor, during the pandemic
item.description: How can teams prepare for the ‘bus factor’ during the pandemic.

item.title: Handling the low tide
item.description: How to make the best of times where there are no burning issues, no urgent tasks.
